Subjects: Godric, saint; saints, prayers to; Nicholas, saint
_description: St. Godric’s prayer to St. Nicholas — four lines, recorded by Geoffrey of Durham

BLRoy5Fvii.Transcription:
Sainte Nicholas godes druðtymbre us faire scone husAt
                    þi burth at þi bareSainte nicholaes bring vs wel
                    þare
